location.title: Where We Are
location.description: We are right next to Solna centrum with quick access to the metro, buses, and parking garages. Please arrive 10 minutes early for safety instructions and wear comfortable sports clothing with indoor shoes.
location.directionsValue: 15 minutes from the Solna centrum subway (blue line) and several bus lines. Parking is available in the nearby garages.
